text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the United Mexican States is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Mexico. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Mexico City. ==List of heads of mission== ===Ambassadors to Mexico=== {| class=wikitable ! AmbassadorHead of Mission – Embassy of Malaysia, Mexico City ! Term start ! Halim Ab. Rahman || 28 February 2002 || 30 June 2005 |- | Shamsudin Abdullah || 3 July 2005 || 2 July 2007 |- | Nafisah Mohamed || 28 August 2008 || 24 January 2011 |- | Jamaiyah Mohamed Yusof || 9 May 2011 || 23 March 2015 |- | Mohammad Azhar Mazlan || 9 July 2015 || 11 February 2018 |- | Muzafar Shah Mustafa || 2018 || Incumbent |} ==See also== * Malaysia–Mexico relations == References == Mexico Malaysia
title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Mexico
